sourceDesc.bibl: St. Mary’s Cemetery (South Corning, New York, USA), McLaughlin (James, Hannah, Charles, Wm., Margaret) marker; personally read c. 1990, location of marker in cemetery from entrance, take first right, road curves left and merges, gravestone is at that intersection on the left, it is an obelisk with a cross on top, marker appears to have been created long after many of the actual deaths, and contains errors.

correction.p: Rough transcription in person, later verified and corrected from photograph.
